## CodeIgniter\Commands\Utilities\Namespaces

<table style="text-align:left">
<tr><th>Class</th><td>Namespaces</td></tr>
<tr><th>Fully Qualified Name</th><td>CodeIgniter\Commands\Utilities\Namespaces</td></tr>
<tr><th>Extends</th><td><a href="../../../../../../../api/vendor/codeigniter4/framework/system/CLI/BaseCommand.md">CodeIgniter\CLI\BaseCommand</a></td></tr>
</table>


<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Lists namespaces set in Config\Autoload with their
full server path. Helps you to verify that you have
the namespaces setup correctly.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
<tr style="vertical-align:top;">
<th>package</th>
<td>CodeIgniter\Commands
</td>
</tr>
</table>

<details>
<summary><small>Source: 24 lines (106 - 129)</small></summary>

```php
public function run(array $params)
{
	$config = new Autoload();

	$tbody = [];
	foreach ($config->psr4 as $ns => $path)
	{
		$path = realpath($path) ?: $path;

		$tbody[] = [
			$ns,
			realpath($path) ?: $path,
			is_dir($path) ? 'Yes' : 'MISSING',
		];
	}

	$thead = [
		'Namespace',
		'Path',
		'Found?',
	];

	CLI::table($tbody, $thead);
}
```

</details>
